news.title: EA going private in $55 billion deal that will pay shareholders $210 a share
news.summary: Electronic Arts says it has agreed to be acquired by PIF, Silver Lake and Affinity Partners in an all-cash deal worth $55 billion.

news.title: Cleveland Fed’s Hammack warns of 'challenging time' amid inflation worries
news.summary: "On the inflation side right now, I continue to be worried," Cleveland Federal Reserve President Beth Hammack Hammack told CNBC's "Squawk Box Europe"

news.title: Trump threatens mass firings of federal workers if government shutdown isn't averted, NBC News reports
news.summary: The White House last week told federal agencies to begin preparing for mass firings if Congress does not pass a deal to avert a government shutdown.

news.title: What's the 'natural demand' for EVs in the U.S.? We're about to find out
news.summary: It's set to be a record year for electric vehicle sales, but demand is expected to decline. Federal incentives to buy EVs are discontinued after Tuesday.

news.title: The biggest risk to Fed independence is a divided Congress — not Trump
news.summary: The question for investors now is how much power over the Fed the Senate will cede to the president. The Senate is expected to vote this week on whether to give the president more power.

news.title: I inherited $600K in Apple stock. It now makes up 50% of my portfolio. Is that too risky?
news.summary: “I worry that a downturn in the tech sector, or something Apple-specific, could wipe out half my portfolio,” he says.

news.title: This stock and bond strategy is so disliked — and it’s probably your best investment move for the next 10 years
news.summary: In the past, when the market was overvalued as it is now, a 60/40 portfolio almost always beat the S&P 500 over the subsequent decade.

news.title: These TikTok and Instagram financial influencers aren’t your father’s investment advisers
news.summary: Young people get information from entirely different sources than older folks. They have different views on money — how to save it, how to spend it and how to get rich.
